channel.title: Need to fix this help please
channel.description:
I know Ive posted this a while back but its still fucked up. This has been going on for about a month now and im tired of using this shitty family desktop haha.
[IMG]http://i584.photobucket.com/albums/ss285/Nightmare97/Mobile%20Uploads/2011-07-22_025826.jpg[/img]
That comes up when i boot up my laptop, win 7 toshiba. And it just repeats that message over and over. That happened after i used DBAN (dariks boot and nuke). A buddy of mine downloaded windows on a cd and when i try to boot that cd at startup, same thing happens in the picture, help please. Any ideas at all?

item.title: Need to fix this help please
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

The problem is it’s trying to boot from the network, which is why you are still getting the same error regardless of whether a CD is inserted or not, didn’t have to use DBAN, all was needed was a simple boot sequence modification. Have to change it to boot from disc, now that you’ve nuked your OS…

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fix this help please

item.title: Need to fix this help please
item.dc:creator: @Dunder_Mifflin1 Dunder Mifflin
item.description:
@Dunder_Mifflin1 wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:2, topic:410104”]DBAN completely erases your entire disc. You need to reinstall your OS, nothing else can fix it.

TIP: DBAN is good for when the FBI is outside your door, not for cleaning your computer like what you wanted to do.[/quote]

ive tried googling and cant find a tut, do you know of one? [quote=“Ix Soulcist xI, post:3, topic:410104”]You could go to www.thepiratebay.org and type in Windows 7, click on SE, and click the first link and download that. Then put all those files on a CD and boot it from there.[/quote]

ill try this

whats SE lol

think i found it, is it this? http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6072687/Windows_7_Ultimate_-32_Bit%28Auto_Activation%29_-_Cracked

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fix this help please

item.title: Need to fix this help please
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

You could go to www.thepiratebay.org and type in Windows 7, click on SE, and click the first link and download that. Then put all those files on a CD and boot it from there.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fix this help please

item.title: Need to fix this help please
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

DBAN completely erases your entire disc. You need to reinstall your OS, nothing else can fix it.

TIP: DBAN is good for when the FBI is outside your door, not for cleaning your computer like what you wanted to do.

Read full topic
item.source: Need to fix this help please
